info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 10:17PM CST until December 15 at 11:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Stephenson County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1016 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Winslow to near Shannon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Freeport around 1025 PM CST. German Valley around 1030 PM CST. Ridott around 1035 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Illinois.
